expires.description: after this deadline the key is no longer valid

extensionDeadline.description: the key must be used by this time to remain valid

created_by.description: id of the user that created the grant

resource.description: a resource name in Infra's Universal Resource Notation

deviceCode.description: a code that a device will use to exchange for an access key after device login is approved

expiresIn.description: The number of seconds that this set of values is valid

interval.description: the number of seconds the device should wait between polling to see if the user has finished logging in

userCode.description: This is the text the user will enter at the Verification URI

verificationURI.description: This is the URL the user needs to enter into their browser to start logging in

status.description: can be one of pending, rejected, expired, confirmed

created_by.description: id of the user that created the grant
